p: Candida antarctica Lipase B (product number L3170), Candida rugosa lipase (product number L1754), Porcine pancreatic Lipase (product number L3126), geraniol, vinyl acetate, geranyl acetate, 4-nitrophenyl butyrate, and Rhodamine B (Rhb) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich. Graphite powder (325 mesh) was purchased from Qingdao Huatai Lubricant Sealing S&T Co., Ltd. (Qingdao, China). Other chemicals were all of analytical grade.
